title: Pendant

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a pendant, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a left side view of a pendant, showing my new design;
FIG. 2 is a front view thereof;
FIG. 3 is right side view thereof;
FIG. 4 is a top view thereof;
FIG. 5 is a rear view thereof, with the diamond in the center shown in an alternative position;
FIG. 6 is a bottom view thereof; and,
FIG. 7 is a front perspective view thereof.
